client.view

Class RenderItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.view.RenderItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<RenderItem>

    public class RenderItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<RenderItem>
    RenderItem is a class that represents a sprite to be rendered and handles all positioning
    Author:
    Jelmer Firet

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RenderItem(java.lang.String textureName, double x, double y, double refX, double refY, int layer)
      Creates a new RenderItem
      RenderItem(java.lang.String textureName, int x, int y, double refX, double refY, int layer, int animationOffset)
      Same as RenderItem without animationOffset, except this sets an animation offset.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RenderItem

        public RenderItem(java.lang.String textureName,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  double refX,
                  double refY,
                  int layer)
        Creates a new RenderItem
        Parameters:
        textureName -
        x - The x coördinate where the reference point will end up on the canvas
        y - The y coördinate where the reference point will end up on the canvas
        refX - The x position of the reference point within the image: 0.0 = left, 1.0 = right
        refY - The y position of the reference point within the image: 0.0 = top, 1.0 = bottom

      • RenderItem

        public RenderItem(java.lang.String textureName,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  double refX,
                  double refY,
                  int layer,
                  int animationOffset)
        Same as RenderItem without animationOffset, except this sets an animation offset.
        Parameters:
        animationOffset - The number of frames this item is out of sync.
        See Also:
        RenderItem

    • Method Detail

      • setRotation

        public void setRotation(float rotation)
        Sets the rotation of the sprite
        Parameters:
        rotation - degrees to rotate the object clockwise

      • setFlip

        public void setFlip(boolean flip)
        Sets whether the sprite is flipped horizontally; flipping occurs before any rotation
        Parameters:
        flip - sets the flip flag of this RenderItem

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(RenderItem other)
        Sort method to ensure correct drawing order
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<RenderItem>
        Parameters:
        other - object to compare to
        Returns:
        a value that indicates which one should be drawn first

      • renderTo

        public void renderTo(android.graphics.Canvas c,
                     int offsetX,
                     int offsetY)
        Draws this RenderItem to a Canvas. It places the refX and refY of the image at the correct place and applies any flips, rotations and/or offsets (in that order)
        Parameters:
        c - Canvas to draw onto
        offsetX - the x-offset to where the RenderItem would have been drawn
        offsetY - the y-offset to where the RenderItem would have been drawn
